product_details.name: Luxe Gold Huggie Earrings - Elegant Curved Design
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated finish with high-gloss shine
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Sophisticated curved wave design for modern elegance
• Secure huggie-style closure for comfortable wear
• Perfect blend of classic pearls and contemporary styling
• Versatile size suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Hypoallergenic materials for sensitive ears
• Unique architectural design with reflective surface
• Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear
• Ideal gift for fashion-forward jewelry lovers

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner utilizes a minimal, luxurious aesthetic featuring a neutral beige background complemented by soft circular patterns and curved gold accents that add premium visual appeal. The banner’s message is split into three key text layers—"tagline_1" and "tagline_2" for the bold, attention-grabbing announcement in uppercase gold and ochre tones, followed by "heading_1" and "heading_2" introducing the featured product in a serif font with a dark brown shade for sophistication. "description" presents bulleted product highlights to elevate its value. A gold "price" tag with supportive urgency messaging in "urgency_text" leads into a clear, call-to-action button comprised of "cta_background" and "cta".

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige (#F5EFE6)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- Rich Brown (#5D4037)
- Ochre (#B8860B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant hoop earrings with a sophisticated blend of gold and pearl tones. A dominant rich gold (#D4AF37) forms the base, emitting a luxurious and warm glow. Rows of lustrous white pearls (#F8F8F8), detailed with subtle shadows, add texture and opulence. The reflection enhances the depth and draws attention to the curves and craftsmanship. The smooth transitions between the shiny gold and soft white create contrast, yet blend harmoniously, highlighting both textures. For an advertisement banner, a color palette of Gold (#D4AF37), Pearl White (#F8F8F8), Warm Cream (#F5EBDD), and Soft Gray (#C0C0C0) would elevate its elegance.
